name: Team up
description: Teamup - A crowdsourcing platform to collaborate, participate, build, network, learn, unite, and enjoy! Here you can find your peers who can collaborate and join with you in any event, hackathon, sports, projects, dinner and much more!

name: Season of RevisionSlider
description: The RevisionSlider is a MediaWiki extension, It adds a slider to the diff page that allows to easily navigate through revisions.

name: VideoCutTool
description: Tool to cut and trim videos in Wikimedia Commons. More info at https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Commons:VideoCutTool

name: Flick - A short video application
description: Indian application to entertain the masses.

name: dShop Inventory Application
description: Dshop Inventory management tool allows SAP colleagues and other community members to request the devices in an easy and simple way, This helps dshop admins to easily manage the catalog.

name: Phishing Detection using SHAP
description: Build a system that helps in explaining why some domains are malicious. An analysis using SHAP and identifying the most important features contributing to the URL being malicious.

name: Distributed Readers Writers
description: Built a model for the readers-writers problem and implemented using Java Remote Method Invocation.

name: SLara App - Sign Language Reader Application
description: Mobile app that can recognize Indian sign language and read out loud to help people with hearing impairments communicate efficiently with others who donâ€™t know sign language.

name: Forex Forecaster
description: Support SAP customers to hedge currency at the best rates by providing them with a predictive tool that helps them time hedging for maximum profitability.

name: Kottayam House Boat Database Management System
description: A PostgreSQL-based application for managing houseboats. The project maintains records of each boat, routes, customers, and owners, and supports all other related queries.

name: WhatsApp Karo
description: Users can send messages on WhatsApp without saving contacts.
